title: Mandy und die Mächte des Bösen
overview: A traumatized city girl fighting evil: Mandy is in her late 20s and has been suffering from agoraphobia and panic attacks since an accident. Then the ghost of her neighbor Selcan appears to her and explains to Mandy that dark forces threaten the people around her. Mandy embarks on a chaotic mission to face her demons and save the people she loves.
